Orochimaru releases several snakes from his sleeves that attack the opponent and then lift them into the air, where the snakes then detach from him and spin around the opponent whilst attacking them multiple times before dispersing.

== Trivia ==
* The [[wikipedia:Dinodon rufozonatum|red-banded snake]] is the name of a snake found in some Asian countries.

[[pt-br:Cobra de União Vermelha]]
